headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  DIDDEL SUSSMAN, KATHA

snippet: DIDDEL SUSSMAN--Katha. Every day, your presence, energy and memory lives within us. We love you. Paul, Thompson, Kiki, Jane, Becky and David. 1/3
lead_paragraph: DIDDEL SUSSMAN--Katha. Every day, your presence, energy and memory lives within us. We love you. Paul, Thompson, Kiki, Jane, Becky and David. 1/3
